title: Lonely Planet
description: Outdoor vegetarian restaurant. Waiters speak English and will assist vegans as most of the menu has dairy. Thalis are served for lunch. Ask for 'special tea' for beer served in a teapot. 200Rs will get you well fed. Directions: Located in the coconut grove behind the shops, on Lighthouse Beach. Look for signs. Also sell vegetarian recipes book for 300Rps.
